alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:02AM CDT until March 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River Near Suttle affecting Perry and Dallas Counties. .Heavy rainfall occurred over the last week over the Cahaba River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Cahaba River. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River Near Suttle. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flooding of pasture lands and low-lying agricultural lands occurs in the Suttle area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 30.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 32.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
